text: “Iye ndi Yemwe amakuyendetsani pa ntunda ndi pa nyanja; kufikira pomwe mumakhala m’zombo; ndipo zimayenda nawo (zombozo) ndi mphepo yabwino, naisangalalira. (Mwadzidzidzi) namondwe nkuzidzera (zombozo) ndipo mafunde nkuwadzera mbali zonse natsimikiza kuti azingidwa (ndi chionongeko); amampempha Allah modzipereka kwa Iye mukupempha kwawo (uku akunena): “Ngati mutipulumutsa pa ichi, tidzakhala m’gulu la oyamika (nthawi zonse)!”
